Package screen

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Orientable
    Operation of a device (usually a Screen) that can change its orientation
    Tappable
    A simple interface with only one gesture
    Touchable
    A more complete interface with basic gestures Actually it's much more complicated
